level_0.name: Swimming
level_0.description: Normal swimming - safe, no action needed

level_1.name: Risky
level_1.description: Risky behavior - monitor and be ready to intervene

level_2.name: Drowning
level_2.description: EMERGENCY: Drowning detected via temporal escalation - immediate response required

class_descriptions.Level 2: Drowning emergency (temporal escalation: Level 1 sustained 2s continuously)

temporal_logic.escalation_rule: Level 1 continuous detection for 2 seconds automatically escalates to Level 2
temporal_logic.description: Model outputs only Level 0 and Level 1. Application logic monitors Level 1 duration and escalates to Level 2 (Drowning) when sustained risky behavior is detected.
